markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magical Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3747) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Thaumaturge](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=186)

**Prerequisites**
[Thaumaturge Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3743)

</column>

---

Increase your proficiency rank in one of Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion from expert to master and in another from trained to expert. You gain a skill feat associated with the skill you chose.
name: Magical Knowledge
